question: NTPC Ltd was recently announced to assist which West African country, for the development of solar power projects?
explanation:
The state-owned Electricity PSU, NTPC Limited, formerly known as National Thermal Power Corporation Limited has been announced as the Project Management Consultant for the development of 300 MW of solar power projects in the West African country, Togo. 
The letter of engagement was recently signed between the country and the Indian PSU in this regard. This also marks the first time, a country has sought assistance from NTPC, under the India-led International Solar Alliance. As per the agreement, the African nation Togo is not to incur the cost in this project while the PSU will recover the project cost through bids.
